ai.aiChatModalAdminDesc: I am Majna, your personal assistant. I can help you with anything you need. How can I help you today?
ai.aiFaceSlowReadArticle: If you face slow response, please read this article
ai.aiChatDisabledDesc: To enable Majna AI, you must go to the integrations page and enable it.

name: Name
majnaDesc: Majna is a next-generation e-commerce platform that helps you build your online store in minutes.

adminHome.welcomeDesc: Here you can manage your store, view analytics, and much more.
adminHome.uploadsFolderDesc: This is the folder where all your uploads are stored. You can change the upload options from the settings page.
adminHome.logsFolderDesc: This folder contains all system logs. You can browse and analyze logs or delete them from the Logs page
adminHome.tipsDesc: Here are some tips to help you take full advantage of Majna.
adminHome.someSystemsAreDownDesc: Some systems are down. Please check logs for more information.
